analyzed: lha mo zhes bya ba ni lha mo'i lus la'o //
translated: “The goddess” means in the body of the goddess.

original: bsam pa zhes bya ba ni go cha dgod pa'i sgo nas sems kyi de kho na nyid bsgom pa'o //🔽slar yang de nyid rab tu bya //
analyzed: bsam pa zhes bya ba ni go cha dgod pa'i sgo nas sems kyi de kho na nyid bsgom pa'o // slar yang de nyid rab tu bya //
translated: “The thought” means the meditation on the reality of the mind by means of the armoring.

original: zhes bya ba ni go cha de nyid yang dang yang du dran par bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni go cha de nyid yang dang yang du dran par bya ba'o //
translated: “Again, one should practice that reality” means one should recollect that armor again and again.

original: yang na chags pa dang bral ba rnams go cha bskon pa'i mthar yang dang yang du chags pa bskyed par bya ba'o //🔽de nyid bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: yang na chags pa dang bral ba rnams go cha bskon pa'i mthar yang dang yang du chags pa bskyed par bya ba'o // de nyid bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: Or else, for those who are free from passion, one should generate passion again and again at the end of the armoring.

original: rang gis zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: rang gis zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: In order to demonstrate just that, he says, “one should imagine oneself, etc. ”

original: rang gis zhes bya ba ni shes rab kyis so //
analyzed: rang gis zhes bya ba ni shes rab kyis so //
translated: “One should imagine oneself” means with wisdom.

original: rjes su chags pa ni 'khyud pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: rjes su chags pa ni 'khyud pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: “Passion” means embracing, etc.

original: de nas zhes bya ba ni de'i 'og tu'o //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba ni de'i 'og tu'o //
translated: “Then” means after that.

original: rdo rje zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sems dpas so //
analyzed: rdo rje zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sems dpas so //
translated: “Vajra” means Vajrasattva.

original: de nas bdag nyid rdo rje ru //
analyzed: de nas bdag nyid rdo rje ru //
translated: “Then one should imagine oneself as the vajra”

original: ka ra nar bcas bsam par bya //
analyzed: ka ra nar bcas bsam par bya //
translated: “together with the karaṇa.”

original: zhes bya ba ni ka ra na dang bcas pa'i gnyis su med pa'i bsgom pa bstan pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni ka ra na dang bcas pa'i gnyis su med pa'i bsgom pa bstan pa'o //
translated: This teaches the meditation on the non-duality together with the karaṇa.

original: de nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir /
translated: For that very reason,

original: rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te go sla'o //
analyzed: rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te go sla'o //
translated: he says “vajra” and so on, which is easy to understand.

original: yang na 'di dag gis ni bzlog pa'i bya ba bstan te /
analyzed: yang na 'di dag gis ni bzlog pa'i bya ba bstan te /
translated: Or else, these teach the activity of reversal.

original: de nas zhes bya ba ni ka ra na'i gnas skabs kyi mthar ro //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba ni ka ra na'i gnas skabs kyi mthar ro //
translated: “Then” means at the end of the state of karaṇa.

original: rdo rje zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sems dpa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sems dpa'o //
translated: “Vajra” means Vajrasattva.

original: rang zhes bya ba ni rang gis te rdo rje sems dpa'i rang gis 'khyud pa la sogs pa bya ba'o //
analyzed: rang zhes bya ba ni rang gis te rdo rje sems dpa'i rang gis 'khyud pa la sogs pa bya ba'o //
translated: “One’s own” means by oneself, the activity of embracing Vajrasattva with oneself.

original: nam zhe na /
analyzed: nam zhe na /
translated: When?

original: rjes su chags pa'i sems zhes bya ba smos te /🔽tsitta na zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: rjes su chags pa'i sems zhes bya ba smos te / tsitta na zhes bya ba la /
translated: He says “with a mind of passion.”🔽In “citta-na,”

original: tsitta ni sems so //
analyzed: tsitta ni sems so //
translated: citta means mind.

original: na ni dgag pa ste chags pa'i sems med pa'o //
analyzed: na ni dgag pa ste chags pa'i sems med pa'o //
translated: Na is a negation, so there is no mind of passion.

original: des 'di skad gang gi tshe ka ra na'i mthar shes rab rjes su chags pa'i sems dang bral ba de'i tshe /
analyzed: des 'di skad gang gi tshe ka ra na'i mthar shes rab rjes su chags pa'i sems dang bral ba de'i tshe /
translated: He says this: When one is free from the mind of passion for the tip of the karana, then

original: rang nyid kyis 'khyud pa bya ba ston to //
analyzed: rang nyid kyis 'khyud pa bya ba ston to //
translated: one should display the act of embracing oneself.

original: de nas zhes bya ba ni 'og tu'o //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba ni 'og tu'o //
translated: Then means afterwards.

original: bdag nyid rdo rje ni rdo rje sems dpa'o //
analyzed: bdag nyid rdo rje ni rdo rje sems dpa'o //
translated: The vajra self is Vajrasattva.

original: ka ra bcas bsam par bya //
analyzed: ka ra bcas bsam par bya //
translated: One should imagine the karana.

original: zhes bya ba la ka ra ni go sla'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la ka ra ni go sla'o //
translated: The karana is easy to understand.

original: bsam pa ni sems pa'o //🔽bya ba ni sems pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i bya ba ste de'i tshe bzlog ste /
analyzed: bsam pa ni sems pa'o // bya ba ni sems pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i bya ba ste de'i tshe bzlog ste /
translated: Imagining is thinking.

original: 'og tu gnas nas bud med du bya ba la 'jug pa'o ;
analyzed: 'og tu gnas nas bud med du bya ba la 'jug pa'o ;
translated: The act is the act that accords with the thought. At that time, one should reverse it and, dwelling below, engage in the act of woman.

original: / de nyid bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: / de nyid bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to teach just that, he says,

original: rdo rje yi zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: rdo rje yi zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: the vajra, etc.

original: rdo rje sems dpa'i nga rgyal tsam la gnas pa yin gyis bya ba la ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa'i nga rgyal tsam la gnas pa yin gyis bya ba la ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: One should abide in the pride of Vajrasattva alone, not in the act. This is the meaning.

original: de ltar ka ra na bzhi bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar ka ra na bzhi bstan nas /
translated: Having thus taught the four karanas,

original: da ni khva ga mu kha'i rtsa'i rang bzhin bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni khva ga mu kha'i rtsa'i rang bzhin bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: now, in order to teach the nature of the channel of the crane face, he says,

original: chu las byung ba @234b zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: chu las byung ba @234b zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: The flower of the water and so forth are mentioned.

original: chu las byung ba'i me tog ces bya ba ni padma ste chos 'byung ngo //
analyzed: chu las byung ba'i me tog ces bya ba ni padma ste chos 'byung ngo //
translated: The flower of the water is the lotus, which is the source of phenomena.

original: de ci zhig bya zhe na /
analyzed: de ci zhig bya zhe na /
translated: What is done with that?

original: gsang ba'i nang gi mtshan nyid las //🔽zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: gsang ba'i nang gi mtshan nyid las // zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: From the inner characteristics of the secret.

original: chos 'byung ba de'i mtshan ma'i nang gi gsang ba'i mtshan nyid de kh'a ga mu kha'i rtsa nyid do //
analyzed: chos 'byung ba de'i mtshan ma'i nang gi gsang ba'i mtshan nyid de kh'a ga mu kha'i rtsa nyid do //
translated: The characteristics of the source of phenomena are the inner characteristics of the secret, which is the channel of the secret place.

original: de ci 'dra zhe na /
analyzed: de ci 'dra zhe na /
translated: What is it like?

original: rtsa ba myu gu me tog ste //
analyzed: rtsa ba myu gu me tog ste //
translated: The root, the sprout, and the flower,

original: bandu ka ni rgyas pa 'dra //🔽zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: bandu ka ni rgyas pa 'dra // zhes bya ba la /
translated: like a full bandhuka.

original: ji ltar myu gu dang me tog gi rtsa ba 'dra bar rtsa thams cad kyi myu gu dang / bde ba'i 'bras bu dang bcas pa'i me tog gi gnas su gyur bas rtsa ste kh'a ga mu kha'o //
analyzed: ji ltar myu gu dang me tog gi rtsa ba 'dra bar rtsa thams cad kyi myu gu dang / bde ba'i 'bras bu dang bcas pa'i me tog gi gnas su gyur bas rtsa ste kh'a ga mu kha'o //
translated: Just as the root is like the sprout and the flower, the channel is the source of all the sprouts of the channels and the flower of the result of bliss, which is the channel of the secret place.

original: yang na ming dang gzugs kyi myu gu dang / skye mched drug gi me tog la sogs pa'i gnas su gyur pas na rtsa ba'o //
analyzed: yang na ming dang gzugs kyi myu gu dang / skye mched drug gi me tog la sogs pa'i gnas su gyur pas na rtsa ba'o //
translated: Alternately, the root is the source of the sprout of name and form and the flower of the six sense bases and so on.

original: da ni sngar bstan pa'i go cha'i gnas bstan pa'i sgo nas gsal bar bya ba'i phyir thong ka gnyis su zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: da ni sngar bstan pa'i go cha'i gnas bstan pa'i sgo nas gsal bar bya ba'i phyir thong ka gnyis su zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: Now, in order to clarify the teaching of the locations of the armor taught above, he says “in the two shoulders” and so forth.

original: thong ka gnyis kyi sa bon rnams //🔽zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: thong ka gnyis kyi sa bon rnams // zhes bya ba la /
translated: The seed syllables in the two shoulders.

original: thong ka gnyis zhes bya ba ni phrag pa gnyis so //
analyzed: thong ka gnyis zhes bya ba ni phrag pa gnyis so //
translated: “Two shoulders” means the two shoulders.

original: sa bon rnams zhes bya ba ni mang po'i tshig ste /
analyzed: sa bon rnams zhes bya ba ni mang po'i tshig ste /
translated: “Seed syllables” is a plural term.

original: dgod par bya ba'i sa bon mang po nyid kyis na /
analyzed: dgod par bya ba'i sa bon mang po nyid kyis na /
translated: Since there are many seed syllables to be set,

original: brtsegs pa'i yi ge dgod pa'i gnas kyang mgrin pa dang / snying ga dang lte ba'i rtsa ba'i bar du gzung bar ston pa yin gyi brtsegs pa'i yi ge tsam la mang por brjod pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: brtsegs pa'i yi ge dgod pa'i gnas kyang mgrin pa dang / snying ga dang lte ba'i rtsa ba'i bar du gzung bar ston pa yin gyi brtsegs pa'i yi ge tsam la mang por brjod pa ni ma yin no //
translated: the locations for setting the stacked syllables are taught as being from the throat, heart, and navel cakras, but the term “many” is not applied to the stacked syllables themselves.

original: de la phrag pa gnyis su ni hmryum ngo //
analyzed: de la phrag pa gnyis su ni hmryum ngo //
translated: In that regard, the two shoulders are HŪM and RŪM.

original: mgrin par ni smryum ngo //
analyzed: mgrin par ni smryum ngo //
translated: The throat is SŪM and RŪM.

original: snying gar ni ymrum ngo //
analyzed: snying gar ni ymrum ngo //
translated: The heart is YŪM and RŪM.

original: lte bar ni kshmam ngo //
analyzed: lte bar ni kshmam ngo //
translated: The navel is KṢAM and MĀM.

original: sa dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: sa dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: Earth and so forth.

original: sa zhes bya ba ni yi ge h'um ste /
analyzed: sa zhes bya ba ni yi ge h'um ste /
translated: “Earth” is the syllable HŪM.

original: de nyid mig gnyis su'o //
analyzed: de nyid mig gnyis su'o //
translated: That is in the two eyes.

original: rlung zhes bya ba ni yi ge yum ste /
analyzed: rlung zhes bya ba ni yi ge yum ste /
translated: The so-called wind is the letter YUM.

original: de ni rna ba dang / sna dag la'o //
analyzed: de ni rna ba dang / sna dag la'o //
translated: That is in the ears and nose.

original: 'og ces bya ba ni lce ste /
analyzed: 'og ces bya ba ni lce ste /
translated: The so-called below is the tongue,

original: 'og na gnas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'og na gnas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is located below.

original: chu'i rang bzhin bzhin zhes bya ba ni der yi ge sum yu dgod pa'o //
analyzed: chu'i rang bzhin bzhin zhes bya ba ni der yi ge sum yu dgod pa'o //
translated: The nature of water is like this.

original: myu gu zhes bya ba ni myu gu lta bu ste /
analyzed: myu gu zhes bya ba ni myu gu lta bu ste /
translated: The so-called sprout is like a sprout.

original: steng na gnas pa'i rkan gyi nu ma'o //
analyzed: steng na gnas pa'i rkan gyi nu ma'o //
translated: It is the upper palate, which is located above.

original: mo'i sa bon ni yi ge kshum ngo //
analyzed: mo'i sa bon ni yi ge kshum ngo //
translated: The seed of the female is the letter KSHUM.

original: da ni lha mo bskyed pa'i sa bon nyid padma'i nang du dgod par bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni lha mo bskyed pa'i sa bon nyid padma'i nang du dgod par bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: Now, in order to teach the placement of the seed of the goddess generation itself in the lotus,

original: sde tshan zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: sde tshan zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: he says “group” and so on.

original: 'di dag gi don ni yi ge aas lha mo'i gzugs bskyed par ston te /
analyzed: 'di dag gi don ni yi ge aas lha mo'i gzugs bskyed par ston te /
translated: The meaning of these is to teach the generation of the form of the goddess with the letter A.

original: sngar bstan pa dran par byed pa yin no //🔽de ltar dran par byas nas mtshams sbyar ba'i 'og tu ci @235a * //
analyzed: sngar bstan pa dran par byed pa yin no // de ltar dran par byas nas mtshams sbyar ba'i 'og tu ci @235a * //
translated: It is a reminder of what was taught before.

original: bya ba bstan pa'i phyir //
analyzed: bya ba bstan pa'i phyir //
translated: Having thus reminded, in order to teach what is to be done after the connection,

original: sa yi nang du thim par bya //
analyzed: sa yi nang du thim par bya //
translated: he says “dissolve into the earth” and so on.

original: zhes bya ba smos te de las zhes bya ba ni chos 'byung ba ste bde ba chen po'i gnas su bcu gnyis kyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba smos te de las zhes bya ba ni chos 'byung ba ste bde ba chen po'i gnas su bcu gnyis kyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The there is the source of phenomena, the place of great bliss, because it has the nature of the twelve.

original: thim pa ni dgod pa'o //
analyzed: thim pa ni dgod pa'o //
translated: Dissolve means to place.

original: de nas ci zhig bya zhe na /
analyzed: de nas ci zhig bya zhe na /
translated: Then what should be done?

original: dus me zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: dus me zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: The time fire and so on are mentioned.

original: de la dus kyi me zhes bya ba ni g-yas pa'o //
analyzed: de la dus kyi me zhes bya ba ni g-yas pa'o //
translated: There, the time fire is the right one,

original: yi dags kyi me zhes bya ba ni g-yon pa ste /
analyzed: yi dags kyi me zhes bya ba ni g-yon pa ste /
translated: and the ghost fire is the left one.

original: dang por thabs kyi g-yas pas shes rab la 'khyud nas de'i 'og tu g-yon pas 'khyud par bya ba'o //
analyzed: dang por thabs kyi g-yas pas shes rab la 'khyud nas de'i 'og tu g-yon pas 'khyud par bya ba'o //
translated: First, the method embraces the wisdom with the right, and then with the left.

original: shes rab kyis bzlog ste 'khyud pa bstan pa'i phyir ;
analyzed: shes rab kyis bzlog ste 'khyud pa bstan pa'i phyir ;
translated: In order to teach the embrace reversed by wisdom,

original: yi dags zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: yi dags zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: the ghost and so on are mentioned.

original: shes rab kyi dang por g-yon pas thabs la 'khyud nas de'i 'og tu g-yas pa 'khyud pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi dang por g-yon pas thabs la 'khyud nas de'i 'og tu g-yas pa 'khyud pa'o //
translated: Wisdom first embraces the method with the left, and then with the right.

original: de ltar na de dag gis ni thabs kyi ni g-yas pa gtso la /
analyzed: de ltar na de dag gis ni thabs kyi ni g-yas pa gtso la /
translated: In this way, they teach that the right is primary for the method,

original: shes rab kyi ni g-yon pa gtso bor ston to //
analyzed: shes rab kyi ni g-yon pa gtso bor ston to //
translated: and the left is primary for wisdom.

original: lag pa gnyis kyis kha sbyar ba //
analyzed: lag pa gnyis kyis kha sbyar ba //
translated: The two hands are joined together.

original: zhes bya ba ni bsrub pa ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bsrub pa ste /
translated: This is the churning,

original: de ltar lag pa gnyis 'khyud pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar lag pa gnyis 'khyud pa'o //
translated: and so the two hands are embraced.

original: ci 'dra bas she na /
analyzed: ci 'dra bas she na /
translated: What kind of [hands]?

original: mthe'u chung zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: mthe'u chung zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: He says, “the little fingers, etc.

original: mthe'u chung mthe mnan nas su //
analyzed: mthe'u chung mthe mnan nas su //
translated: The little fingers are pressed by the thumbs.

original: zhes bya ba ni /🔽lag pa gnyis kyi mthe bo gnyis kyis mthe'u chung gnyis kyi tshigs gsum pa mnan pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni / lag pa gnyis kyi mthe bo gnyis kyis mthe'u chung gnyis kyi tshigs gsum pa mnan pa'o //
translated: This is🔽the third [mudra].

original: gsum pa rdo rje rtse mor brkyang //
analyzed: gsum pa rdo rje rtse mor brkyang //
translated: The middle [fingers] are extended at the tip of the vajra.

original: zhes bya ba ni sor mo lhag ma gsum bsgreng ba'o //🔽rdo rje zhes bya ba ni rdo rje rtse gsum gyi rnam pa ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sor mo lhag ma gsum bsgreng ba'o // rdo rje zhes bya ba ni rdo rje rtse gsum gyi rnam pa ste /
translated: This is the extension of the remaining three fingers.🔽The vajra is the form of the three-pointed vajra.

original: rdo rje rtse gsum pa'i phyag rgya des bsdams pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje rtse gsum pa'i phyag rgya des bsdams pa'o //
translated: With that vajra-three-pointed mudra, one binds.

original: des gang du bsdam zhe na /🔽phyag rgya gnyis kyi glor btsugs nas //
analyzed: des gang du bsdam zhe na / phyag rgya gnyis kyi glor btsugs nas //
translated: Where does one bind with that?

original: zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: He says, “inserted between the two mudras.🔽”

original: phyag rgya gnyis zhes bya ba ni g-yas pa dang g-yon pa'i rdo rje rtse gsum pa'i phyag rgya gnyis so //
analyzed: phyag rgya gnyis zhes bya ba ni g-yas pa dang g-yon pa'i rdo rje rtse gsum pa'i phyag rgya gnyis so //
translated: The two mudras are the two right and left three-pointed vajra mudras.

original: glor btsugs nas zhes bya ba ni phan tshun du thabs dang shes rab kyi rked pa ngos gnyis su bsdams pa'o //
analyzed: glor btsugs nas zhes bya ba ni phan tshun du thabs dang shes rab kyi rked pa ngos gnyis su bsdams pa'o //
translated: “Piercing through” means that the two sides of the waist of means and insight are bound together.

original: bdud rtsi bza' ba sems pa yis //
analyzed: bdud rtsi bza' ba sems pa yis //
translated: “Thinking of eating the nectar”

original: rnon pos 'og ma btsir bar bya //
analyzed: rnon pos 'og ma btsir bar bya //
translated: “with the sharp” means “pressing down on the lower one.”

original: zhes bya ba la sems pa zhes bya ba rnal 'byor pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sems pa zhes bya ba rnal 'byor pa'o //
translated: “Thinking” is the yogin.

original: 'og ma zhes bya ba ni mchu ste /
analyzed: 'og ma zhes bya ba ni mchu ste /
translated: “The lower one” is the lip.

original: sbrang rtse lta bu'i bdud rtsi'i gnas su gyur pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sbrang rtse lta bu'i bdud rtsi'i gnas su gyur pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is the place of the nectar which is like honey.

original: bza' zhes bya ba ni btung zhing myang ba ste bshad zin to //
analyzed: bza' zhes bya ba ni btung zhing myang ba ste bshad zin to //
translated: “Eating” is drinking and tasting, as already explained.

original: bcu @235b dang brgyad kyi lam dag nas //
analyzed: bcu @235b dang brgyad kyi lam dag nas //
translated: “From the paths of the eighteen”

original: dril bu'i bdud rtsi bskul bar bya //
analyzed: dril bu'i bdud rtsi bskul bar bya //
translated: “the nectar of the bell is summoned.”

original: zhes bya ba ni gnas bco brgyad nas shes rab kyi khu ba phab pa ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni gnas bco brgyad nas shes rab kyi khu ba phab pa ste /
translated: The semen of insight is emitted from the eighteen places.

original: sngar bstan pa dran par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: sngar bstan pa dran par byed pa yin no //
translated: It is a reminder of what was previously taught.

original: g-yon gyi cha na bandu ka //🔽zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: g-yon gyi cha na bandu ka // zhes bya ba la /
translated: “The bandhuka on the left side”

original: g-yon gyi cha zhes bya ba ni chos 'byung ba'i g-yon phyogs so //
analyzed: g-yon gyi cha zhes bya ba ni chos 'byung ba'i g-yon phyogs so //
translated: “The left side” is the left side of the source of phenomena.

original: bandu ka zhes bya ba ni me tog gi bandu ka lta bu ste /
analyzed: bandu ka zhes bya ba ni me tog gi bandu ka lta bu ste /
translated: The “bandhuka” is like the bandhuka flower.

original: khva ga mu kha'i rtsa'o //
analyzed: khva ga mu kha'i rtsa'o //
translated: It is the channel of the crow’s beak.

original: ci 'dra zhe na chu 'dzag pa'i cha byad ces bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: ci 'dra zhe na chu 'dzag pa'i cha byad ces bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: What is it like? It is said, “the form of a dripping water,” etc.

original: kun du nyon mongs pa 'jig par byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: kun du nyon mongs pa 'jig par byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: means that it destroys the afflictions.

original: de nyid ces bya ba la /
analyzed: de nyid ces bya ba la /
translated: As for “that itself,”

original: phyin ci ma log pa gnyis su med pa'i ye shes so /
analyzed: phyin ci ma log pa gnyis su med pa'i ye shes so /
translated: it is nonerroneous, nondual wisdom.

original: de nyid phyag rgya ste yid mgu pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de nyid phyag rgya ste yid mgu pa'i phyir ro //
translated: “ That itself is the seal” because it delights the mind.

original: bcing ba ni gdab pa'o //
analyzed: bcing ba ni gdab pa'o //
translated: “ Binding” means to cast.

original: kha cig ni mnyam pa'i rkang stabs kyi mtshan nyid yin no zhes zer te /
analyzed: kha cig ni mnyam pa'i rkang stabs kyi mtshan nyid yin no zhes zer te /
translated: Some say that it has the characteristic of even footwork.

original: gnyis kun du 'dus nas zhes bya ba ni rkang pa gnyis phan tshun du 'dus pa'o //
analyzed: gnyis kun du 'dus nas zhes bya ba ni rkang pa gnyis phan tshun du 'dus pa'o //
translated: “ The two completely join” means that the two feet completely join each other.

original: de nyid ni bskyod pa ste /
analyzed: de nyid ni bskyod pa ste /
translated: “ That itself is moving”

original: bgegs skyod par byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bgegs skyod par byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: means that it moves the obstacles.

original: phyag rgya zhes bya ba ni mnyam pa'i stabs kyi phyag rgya'o zhes zer ro //
analyzed: phyag rgya zhes bya ba ni mnyam pa'i stabs kyi phyag rgya'o zhes zer ro //
translated: The mudra is the even-placed mudra.

original: mnyam pa'i stabs dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: mnyam pa'i stabs dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: Even-placed and so forth.

original: mnyam pa'i stabs zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: mnyam pa'i stabs zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Even-placed means

original: thabs dang shes rab gnyis rkang pa dag phan tshun sor mos sor mo reg pa'o //
analyzed: thabs dang shes rab gnyis rkang pa dag phan tshun sor mos sor mo reg pa'o //
translated: that the two feet of method and wisdom touch each other with the toes.

original: kha cig ni g-yas kyi sor mo'i rtse mor rkang pa g-yon pa'i rtse mos reg pa'o zhes zer ro //
analyzed: kha cig ni g-yas kyi sor mo'i rtse mor rkang pa g-yon pa'i rtse mos reg pa'o zhes zer ro //
translated: Some say that the tip of the right toes touch the tip of the left toes.

original: dbye ba'i stabs zhes bya ba ni de nyid las shes rab kyi rkang pa g-yon pa cung zad bskum pa'o //
analyzed: dbye ba'i stabs zhes bya ba ni de nyid las shes rab kyi rkang pa g-yon pa cung zad bskum pa'o //
translated: The divided placement is that the wisdom foot is slightly bent from that.

original: zlum po'i stabs zhes bya ba ni mnyam pa'i stabs las pus mo yangs par bskyed pa'o //
analyzed: zlum po'i stabs zhes bya ba ni mnyam pa'i stabs las pus mo yangs par bskyed pa'o //
translated: The round placement is that the knees are spread apart from the even placement.

original: gsum @239a * //
analyzed: gsum @239a * //
translated: The three

original: gnon pa'i stabs ni mnyam pa'i stabs de nyid las shes rab kyi g-yon pa gyen du bteg pa'o //
analyzed: gnon pa'i stabs ni mnyam pa'i stabs de nyid las shes rab kyi g-yon pa gyen du bteg pa'o //
translated: are the even placement, the wisdom foot is raised, and the method foot is bent.

original: rus sbal gyi stabs ni rkang pa g-yas pas g-yon pa mnan pa'o //
analyzed: rus sbal gyi stabs ni rkang pa g-yas pas g-yon pa mnan pa'o //
translated: The tortoise placement is the right foot on top of the left.

original: g-yas brkyang pa ni g-yas brkyang nas g-yon pa cung zad bskum pa'o //
analyzed: g-yas brkyang pa ni g-yas brkyang nas g-yon pa cung zad bskum pa'o //
translated: The right-extended posture is the right leg extended and the left slightly bent.

original: g-yon brkyang ni de las bzlog pa'o //
analyzed: g-yon brkyang ni de las bzlog pa'o //
translated: The left-extended posture is the opposite of that.

original: gnas gcig pa ni gcig gis gnas pa ste /
analyzed: gnas gcig pa ni gcig gis gnas pa ste /
translated: The single-area posture is the single-area posture.

original: rkang pa gcig bteg nas ka ra na sna tshogs kyis snyoms par 'jug cing /
analyzed: rkang pa gcig bteg nas ka ra na sna tshogs kyis snyoms par 'jug cing /
translated: Having lifted one foot, one enters into equipoise with various karaṇḍas,

original: rkang pa ya gcig gis 'khor lo ltar bskor ba'o //
analyzed: rkang pa ya gcig gis 'khor lo ltar bskor ba'o //
translated: and with one foot one turns like a wheel.

original: 'dug pa zhes bya ba ni rol pa'i rkang stabs nyid de /
analyzed: 'dug pa zhes bya ba ni rol pa'i rkang stabs nyid de /
translated: The sitting posture is the very posture of play.

original: 'dis shes rab dang thabs kyi bde ba 'dug pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'dis shes rab dang thabs kyi bde ba 'dug pa'i phyir ro //
translated: By this, one sits in the bliss of wisdom and method.

original: rkang pa'i 'phen pa zhes bya ba ni ji ltar bde bar 'dug pa'o //
analyzed: rkang pa'i 'phen pa zhes bya ba ni ji ltar bde bar 'dug pa'o //
translated: The posture of the foot-throw is sitting as one pleases.

original: mchod sdong gi tshul zhes bya ba ni ngal ba bsal ba'i phyir /
analyzed: mchod sdong gi tshul zhes bya ba ni ngal ba bsal ba'i phyir /
translated: The posture of the pillar is for the sake of removing fatigue.

original: thabs dang shes rab gnyis ka'i steng 'og gi byin pa bsrang ste snyoms par 'jug pa'o //🔽pus mo btsir bzhas bya ba ni tsog tsog por 'dug ste /
analyzed: thabs dang shes rab gnyis ka'i steng 'og gi byin pa bsrang ste snyoms par 'jug pa'o // pus mo btsir bzhas bya ba ni tsog tsog por 'dug ste /
translated: Having straightened the upper and lower thighs of both method and wisdom, one enters into equipoise.🔽The posture of the crossed feet is sitting in a squatting position.

original: pus mo'i steng du gru mo btsugs nas mgrin pa nas 'khyud pa'o //
analyzed: pus mo'i steng du gru mo btsugs nas mgrin pa nas 'khyud pa'o //
translated: Having placed the elbows on the thighs, one embraces from the neck.

original: bsdu ba'i tshul zhes bya ba ni brla gnyis bsnol te /
analyzed: bsdu ba'i tshul zhes bya ba ni brla gnyis bsnol te /
translated: The method of union is that the two thighs are crossed.

original: shes rab kyi byin pa gnyis kyi dbus su zhugs pa'o //🔽gzhan dag na re shes rab kyi pus mo gnyis thabs kyi mchan khud gnyis su bcug ste /
analyzed: shes rab kyi byin pa gnyis kyi dbus su zhugs pa'o // gzhan dag na re shes rab kyi pus mo gnyis thabs kyi mchan khud gnyis su bcug ste /
translated: The two feet of wisdom enter between the two knees of means.

original: lag pa gnyis kyis mgrin pa nas 'khyud pa 'di ni yang dag par bsdu ba'i tshul yin no zhes zer ro //
analyzed: lag pa gnyis kyis mgrin pa nas 'khyud pa 'di ni yang dag par bsdu ba'i tshul yin no zhes zer ro //
translated: Others say that the two knees of wisdom enter between the two groins of means, and the two arms embrace the neck. This is the method of union.

original: mnyam du gnas pa zhes bya ba ni gnyis ka'i yang rkang pa gnyis kha cang mi ring bar brkyang ste 'dug pa'o //
analyzed: mnyam du gnas pa zhes bya ba ni gnyis ka'i yang rkang pa gnyis kha cang mi ring bar brkyang ste 'dug pa'o //
translated: The method of equality is that the two feet of both are extended not too far apart.

original: dus kyi me zhes bya ba ni shes rab kyi rkang pa g-yas pas bdag gi snying gar brtsir ba'o //🔽snying po zhes bya ba ni shes rab kyi rkang pa gnyis bdag gi rkang pa gnyis kyi bar du bcug ste /
analyzed: dus kyi me zhes bya ba ni shes rab kyi rkang pa g-yas pas bdag gi snying gar brtsir ba'o // snying po zhes bya ba ni shes rab kyi rkang pa gnyis bdag gi rkang pa gnyis kyi bar du bcug ste /
translated: The method of the fire of time is that the right foot of wisdom presses on the heart of the male.

original: rkang pa gnyis kyis so sor snying gnyed pa'o //🔽dga' bas gnas pa zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: rkang pa gnyis kyis so sor snying gnyed pa'o //🔽dga' bas gnas pa zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The method of the essence is that the two feet of wisdom are placed between the two feet of the male, and the two feet press on the two hearts.🔽The method of abiding in joy is that the two feet of wisdom are placed on the two shoulders of the male.

original: shes rab kyi brla steng gnyis su thabs kyi brla gnyis bsnol mar bkan te gnas pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi brla steng gnyis su thabs kyi brla gnyis bsnol mar bkan te gnas pa'o //
translated: The two thighs of method are crossed over the two thighs of wisdom and are extended.

original: gcig tu bsdu ba zhes bya ba ni rkang pa gcig bskums te snyoms par 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: gcig tu bsdu ba zhes bya ba ni rkang pa gcig bskums te snyoms par 'jug pa'o //
translated: The “one-fold” is entering into union with one leg drawn in.

original: rkang stabs bskyod pa bco brgyad ni //
analyzed: rkang stabs bskyod pa bco brgyad ni //
translated: The eighteen movements of the legs

original: mchod pa'i dus su sbyar bar bya //🔽zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: mchod pa'i dus su sbyar bar bya // zhes bya ba ni /
translated: are applied at the time of worship.

original: rkang stabs bco brgyad po de dag gis snyoms par 'jug cing rol pa'o //
analyzed: rkang stabs bco brgyad po de dag gis snyoms par 'jug cing rol pa'o //
translated: The eighteen movements of the legs are entering into union and playing.

original: @239b yon tan thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas //
analyzed: @239b yon tan thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas //
translated: The abode of the arising of all qualities

original: rnal 'byor pa yis mchod par bya //🔽zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa yis mchod par bya // zhes bya ba ni /
translated: is worshipped by the yogi/nī.

original: rnal 'byor pas shes rab gang zhig de thams cad nus pa dang ldan pa'i yon tan can de dag bzung nas sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor pas shes rab gang zhig de thams cad nus pa dang ldan pa'i yon tan can de dag bzung nas sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: The yogi/nī should take up and apply all those qualities that are endowed with the ability of wisdom.

original: da ni tshul gyi bye brag bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni tshul gyi bye brag bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: Now, in order to teach the different modes,

original: snying gar 'tshir ba dang zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: snying gar 'tshir ba dang zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: “squeezing at the heart” is stated.

original: lag pa gnyis kyis shes rab kyi rgyab nas 'khyud nas /
analyzed: lag pa gnyis kyis shes rab kyi rgyab nas 'khyud nas /
translated: With both hands, embrace the back of the wisdom.

original: snying gas snying ga btsir zhing //
analyzed: snying gas snying ga btsir zhing //
translated: The heart is squeezed, the heart is pressed.

original: rol pa 'di ni snying ga btsir ba'o //
analyzed: rol pa 'di ni snying ga btsir ba'o //
translated: This play is the pressing of the heart.

original: shes rab kyi rkang pa gnyis rang gi snying gar gzhag ste rol pa 'di ni rkang pa sbyar ba'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi rkang pa gnyis rang gi snying gar gzhag ste rol pa 'di ni rkang pa sbyar ba'o //
translated: Placing the two legs of wisdom at one's heart, this play is the joining of the legs.

original: yang na shes rab kyi rkang pa dang bdag gi rkang par sbyar nas rol pa'o //
analyzed: yang na shes rab kyi rkang pa dang bdag gi rkang par sbyar nas rol pa'o //
translated: Or else, having joined the leg of wisdom with one's own leg, there is play.

original: me tog phreng ba'i tshul sngon du 'gro ba / kun du 'khyud pa 'di ni phreng ba'i tshul lo //
analyzed: me tog phreng ba'i tshul sngon du 'gro ba / kun du 'khyud pa 'di ni phreng ba'i tshul lo //
translated: The method of the garland, preceded by the method of the garland, is the embracing.

original: nu ma la rig pa na nu ma'i tshul lo //
analyzed: nu ma la rig pa na nu ma'i tshul lo //
translated: When there is knowledge of the breasts, it is the method of the breasts.

original: shas rab kyi padma la pa lngags pa dang / shes rab kyis kyang rdo rje gzhibs pa na gnyis ka sbyar ba de bza' ba'o //
analyzed: shas rab kyi padma la pa lngags pa dang / shes rab kyis kyang rdo rje gzhibs pa na gnyis ka sbyar ba de bza' ba'o //
translated: When there is kissing of the lotus of wisdom and also wisdom kisses the vajra, both are joined, that is eating.

original: de yang steng dang 'og tu gnas nas sbyar bar blta ba'o //
analyzed: de yang steng dang 'og tu gnas nas sbyar bar blta ba'o //
translated: Moreover, it is seen that they are joined while abiding above and below.

original: lus kyi gzhogs gcig gis phan tshun 'khyud pa ni phyed kyis 'khyud pa'o //
analyzed: lus kyi gzhogs gcig gis phan tshun 'khyud pa ni phyed kyis 'khyud pa'o //
translated: Mutual embracing with one side of the body is embracing with half.

original: lag pa 'og ma gnyis kyis phan tshun gsang ba la reg cing gong ma gnyis kyis 'khyud pa ni phyed kyis 'khyud nas gsang bar reg pa'o//
analyzed: lag pa 'og ma gnyis kyis phan tshun gsang ba la reg cing gong ma gnyis kyis 'khyud pa ni phyed kyis 'khyud nas gsang bar reg pa'o//
translated: The two lower hands touch each other at the secret place, and the two upper hands embrace.

original: lus kyis lus la reg pa ni lus mnye ba'o //
analyzed: lus kyis lus la reg pa ni lus mnye ba'o //
translated: Touching body with body is massaging the body.

original: yang na phan tshun rkang lag mnye ba'o //
analyzed: yang na phan tshun rkang lag mnye ba'o //
translated: Or, it is massaging each other's arms and legs.

original: mdzub mo dang gung mo ko sko 'degs pa ni ko sko bstod pa'o //
analyzed: mdzub mo dang gung mo ko sko 'degs pa ni ko sko bstod pa'o //
translated: Raising the hips with the index and middle fingers is praising the hips.🔽The face is smiling and charming.

original: zhal ni bzhad cing sgeg pa dang // zhes bya ba ni bzhad pa dang bcas sgeg pa dang bcas pa'i tshul zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhal ni bzhad cing sgeg pa dang // zhes bya ba ni bzhad pa dang bcas sgeg pa dang bcas pa'i tshul zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This means with a smiling and charming manner.

original: mtshan nyid sna tshogs ldan pa yis //
analyzed: mtshan nyid sna tshogs ldan pa yis //
translated: Endowed with various characteristics,

original: de yis las rnams bsgrub par bya //
analyzed: de yis las rnams bsgrub par bya //
translated: one should accomplish the activities with that.

original: zhes bya ba ni tshul rnam pa bcu po der ma zad kyi /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni tshul rnam pa bcu po der ma zad kyi /
translated: This means that the activities should not only be accomplished with those ten manners.

original: 'o na ci zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na /
translated: What then?

original: so dang sen mo gdab pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid sna tshogs kyis bsgrub par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: so dang sen mo gdab pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid sna tshogs kyis bsgrub par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: They should be accomplished with various characteristics such as biting the lips and nails, and so on. This is the meaning.🔽The ten manners are:🔽1. Smiling, 2. laughing, 3. kissing, 4. embracing, 5. massaging, 6. praising the hips, 7. biting, 8. scratching, 9. slapping, and 10. various characteristics.

original: da ni rdo rje dang dril bu nges par gzung bar bya ba'i mjug bsdu ba bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni rdo rje dang dril bu nges par gzung bar bya ba'i mjug bsdu ba bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: Now, in order to teach the conclusion of the certainty of the vajra and bell,

original: rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: [the Bhagavān] declares, vajra, etc.

original: de kho na yis zhes bya ba ni ji skad bstan pa'i rnal 'byor la gus pas so //
analyzed: de kho na yis zhes bya ba ni ji skad bstan pa'i rnal 'byor la gus pas so //
translated: “By that alone” means by devotion to the yoga as taught.

original: so so zhes bya ba ni nges par ro //🔽da ni thabs dang shes rab phan tshun bral bas rnam pa thams cad du dngos @240a * //
analyzed: so so zhes bya ba ni nges par ro // da ni thabs dang shes rab phan tshun bral bas rnam pa thams cad du dngos @240a * //
translated: “Individually” means certainly.

original: grub med par bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: grub med par bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: Now, in order to teach that there is no accomplishment at all by the separation of method and wisdom,

original: gsang ba'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: gsang ba'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: [the Bhagavān] declares, secret, etc.

original: gsang ba'i rdo rje ni thabs so //
analyzed: gsang ba'i rdo rje ni thabs so //
translated: The secret vajra is method.

original: dril bu ni shes rab bo //
analyzed: dril bu ni shes rab bo //
translated: The bell is wisdom.

original: de bzhin du rdo rje dril bu dang bral ba ni shes rab kyis dben pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du rdo rje dril bu dang bral ba ni shes rab kyis dben pa'o //
translated: Similarly, the vajra without the bell is devoid of wisdom.

original: 'grub pa ring bar 'gyur zhes bya ba ni 'grub pa dang ring ba ste bral ba'o //🔽de ltar ldog pa bstan nas rjes su 'gro ba bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: 'grub pa ring bar 'gyur zhes bya ba ni 'grub pa dang ring ba ste bral ba'o // de ltar ldog pa bstan nas rjes su 'gro ba bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: “Accomplishment is far away” means that accomplishment is far away, i.e., absent.

original: rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya dab //
analyzed: rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya dab //
translated: Having thus taught the reverse, in order to teach the forward [process], [the Bhagavān] declares, the consecration of the vajra and bell, etc.

original: dmigs na pha rol dgrol bar 'gyur //
analyzed: dmigs na pha rol dgrol bar 'gyur //
translated: If there is an object, there is liberation of the other.

original: zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: This is what is being said.

original: thabs dang shes rab 'dus na 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //🔽dpe bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: thabs dang shes rab 'dus na 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to // dpe bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: If method and wisdom are combined, there is accomplishment.🔽In order to demonstrate the example, he says

original: mtshan mo zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: mtshan mo zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: at night, etc.🔽At night without the moon,

original: mtshan mo zla ba med pa dang // zhes bya ba ni zla ba med pa'i mtshan mo ste /
analyzed: mtshan mo zla ba med pa dang // zhes bya ba ni zla ba med pa'i mtshan mo ste /
translated: means at night without the moon.

original: ci zhig nus zhes bya ba dang sbyar ro //🔽'dis ni zla ba med pa'i mtshan mo 'od dang bral ba'i phyir /
analyzed: ci zhig nus zhes bya ba dang sbyar ro // 'dis ni zla ba med pa'i mtshan mo 'od dang bral ba'i phyir /
translated: What can it do?

original: bdag dang gzhan gyi don ci yang mi nus so zhes bya bar ston to//
analyzed: bdag dang gzhan gyi don ci yang mi nus so zhes bya bar ston to//
translated: This shows that at night without the moon, because it is devoid of light, it cannot do anything at all for itself or others.

original: nyin mo'i zla bas ci zhig nus //
analyzed: nyin mo'i zla bas ci zhig nus //
translated: What can the moon do by day?

original: zhes bya ba ni de bzhin du mtshan mo dang bral ba'i nyin mo'i zla ba yang 'od mdzes pa dang bral ba'i phyir bdag dang gzhan gyi don cung zad kyang mi nus so zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni de bzhin du mtshan mo dang bral ba'i nyin mo'i zla ba yang 'od mdzes pa dang bral ba'i phyir bdag dang gzhan gyi don cung zad kyang mi nus so zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This means that in the same way, the moon by day, devoid of night, cannot do anything at all for itself or others, because it is devoid of beautiful light.

original: don la nye bar sbyar ba'i phyir //
analyzed: don la nye bar sbyar ba'i phyir //
translated: In order to apply this to the meaning, he says

original: de bas zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: de bas zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: Therefore, etc.

original: ji ltar mtshan mo dang mtshan mo'i bdag po dus mtshungs par 'jug pas /🔽rang dang gzhan gyi don nus pa ltar rdo rje dang dril bu yang mnyam pa ste /
analyzed: ji ltar mtshan mo dang mtshan mo'i bdag po dus mtshungs par 'jug pas / rang dang gzhan gyi don nus pa ltar rdo rje dang dril bu yang mnyam pa ste /
translated: Just as night and the lord of night, i.e., the moon, operate together,

original: snyoms par 'jug pas de kho na nyid gsal bar byed nus pa'o //
analyzed: snyoms par 'jug pas de kho na nyid gsal bar byed nus pa'o //
translated: so the vajra and bell are equal, i.e., are in union, and are able to illuminate reality.

original: de la de kho na nyid ces bya ba ni rang bzhin te /
analyzed: de la de kho na nyid ces bya ba ni rang bzhin te /
translated: There, reality is the nature,

original: de yang phyag rgya chen po dngos grub po //
analyzed: de yang phyag rgya chen po dngos grub po //
translated: and that is the Great Seal, the spiritual attainment.

original: gsal bar byed ces bya ba ni gsal ba'i nus pa dang ldan pa ste sgrub thabs so //
analyzed: gsal bar byed ces bya ba ni gsal ba'i nus pa dang ldan pa ste sgrub thabs so //
translated: Illuminating is the ability to illuminate, i.e., the means of achievement.

original: gzhung kha cig las ni /🔽mnyam pas thams cad gsal bar byed //
analyzed: gzhung kha cig las ni / mnyam pas thams cad gsal bar byed //
translated: In some texts,

original: ces 'byung ste /
analyzed: ces 'byung ste /
translated: it reads:🔽“By equality, all is illuminated.”

original: der yang thams cad kyi sgras ni bsgrub bya bstan pa'o //
analyzed: der yang thams cad kyi sgras ni bsgrub bya bstan pa'o //
translated: There, too, all refers to the object of achievement.

original: a'a li k'a li zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: a'a li k'a li zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: The Alikali, etc.,

original: a'a li k'a li ni thabs dang shes rab kyi sbyor ba'o //
analyzed: a'a li k'a li ni thabs dang shes rab kyi sbyor ba'o //
translated: is the union of means and insight.

original: mdun du bsgom pa ni dang por bsgom pa ste /
analyzed: mdun du bsgom pa ni dang por bsgom pa ste /
translated: Meditation in front is the first meditation.

original: ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar zhe na /
translated: How?

original: rnal 'byor chen po sgrub pa pos //
analyzed: rnal 'byor chen po sgrub pa pos //
translated: The great yogi practitioner

original: zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: should accomplish all aims.

original: rnal 'byor chen po zhes bya ba sngar bstan pa ltar stong pa nyid @240b sngon du 'gro ba'i sa bon dang mtshan ma'i rim gyis skur bskyed pa'o //🔽sgrub pa po zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: rnal 'byor chen po zhes bya ba sngar bstan pa ltar stong pa nyid @240b sngon du 'gro ba'i sa bon dang mtshan ma'i rim gyis skur bskyed pa'o // sgrub pa po zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The great yogi, as previously taught, is one who generates the body by means of the seed and the sign preceded by emptiness.

original: rnal 'byor ba ste /
analyzed: rnal 'byor ba ste /
translated: The practitioner is the yogi.

original: dgos pa thams cad bsgrub par bya //
analyzed: dgos pa thams cad bsgrub par bya //
translated: He should accomplish all aims.

original: zhes pa dang 'brel to //
analyzed: zhes pa dang 'brel to //
translated: This is the connection.

original: a'a li dang k'a li'i don gsungs pa /
analyzed: a'a li dang k'a li'i don gsungs pa /
translated: The meaning of āli and kāli is stated:

original: a'a li zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te go sla'o //
analyzed: a'a li zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te go sla'o //
translated: Āli and so forth are easy to understand.

original: sems can gyi don ma lus pa rnams kyang lha'i gzugs kyi thabs dang shes rab kyis 'grub par bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: sems can gyi don ma lus pa rnams kyang lha'i gzugs kyi thabs dang shes rab kyis 'grub par bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to teach that all the aims of sentient beings are accomplished by the method and wisdom of the deity’s form,

original: sems can zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
analyzed: sems can zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
translated: he says “sentient beings” and so forth.

original: mya ngan las 'das pa yang thabs dang shes rab kyis 'grub pa'i phyir //
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa yang thabs dang shes rab kyis 'grub pa'i phyir //
translated: In order to teach that even nirvāṇa is accomplished by method and wisdom,

original: phyi rol zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: phyi rol zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: he says “external” and so forth.

original: phyi rol zhes bya ba ni 'das pa ste /
analyzed: phyi rol zhes bya ba ni 'das pa ste /
translated: External is past.

original: thabs dang shes rab las 'das shing bral bas so //
analyzed: thabs dang shes rab las 'das shing bral bas so //
translated: Because it transcends and is free from method and wisdom.

original: yang phyi rol zhes bya ba ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul bstan pa ste /
analyzed: yang phyi rol zhes bya ba ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul bstan pa ste /
translated: Again, “external” means the teaching of the perfection method.

original: lha'i ting nge 'dzin gyi thabs dang shes rab ma gtogs par gang gis kyang 'khor ba'i pha rol tu sgrol par byed pa yod pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don te //
analyzed: lha'i ting nge 'dzin gyi thabs dang shes rab ma gtogs par gang gis kyang 'khor ba'i pha rol tu sgrol par byed pa yod pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don te //
translated: The meaning is that there is no one who can liberate to the other side of cyclic existence except by the method and wisdom of the deity’s meditative absorption.

original: de nyid kyi phyir rmongs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir rmongs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: For that very reason, it says “deluded” and so on.

original: rmongs pa ni phyi rol 'ba' zhig gi sems dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: rmongs pa ni phyi rol 'ba' zhig gi sems dang ldan pa'o //
translated: Delusion is the mind that is only external.

original: de'i dam tshig ni de dang rdzas su mthun pas na dam tshig ste phyi rol gyi lam mo //
analyzed: de'i dam tshig ni de dang rdzas su mthun pas na dam tshig ste phyi rol gyi lam mo //
translated: Its commitment is a commitment that is similar to that substance, that is, the external path.

original: yang na aa zhes bya ba ni dgag pa ste /
analyzed: yang na aa zhes bya ba ni dgag pa ste /
translated: Or, “a” is a negation.

original: de la mi bstan pa'o //
analyzed: de la mi bstan pa'o //
translated: It is not taught there.

original: ci zhig ce na /
analyzed: ci zhig ce na /
translated: What?

original: dam tshig ste thabs dang shes rab kyi lha'i ting nge 'dzin to //
analyzed: dam tshig ste thabs dang shes rab kyi lha'i ting nge 'dzin to //
translated: The commitment, which is the deity’s meditative absorption of method and wisdom.

original: de nyid kyi phyir gsang ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te go sla'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir gsang ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te go sla'o //
translated: For that very reason, it says “secret” and so on, which is easy to understand.

original: gang zhig lung ni shes gyur pa //
analyzed: gang zhig lung ni shes gyur pa //
translated: One who has understood the scriptures

original: zhes bya ba la shes gyur pa ni shes par 'dod pa dang / nus pa ste nang gi lam la gzhol pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la shes gyur pa ni shes par 'dod pa dang / nus pa ste nang gi lam la gzhol pa'o //
translated: One who has understood means one who desires to understand, and is capable, who is intent on the inner path.

original: de yis rnal 'byor ba ru grags //
analyzed: de yis rnal 'byor ba ru grags //
translated: He is known as a yogi.

original: zhes bya ba ni de kho na nyid la sbyor bar nus pa dang / dngos grub 'dzin pa po zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni de kho na nyid la sbyor bar nus pa dang / dngos grub 'dzin pa po zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
translated: He is known as a yogi means he is capable of uniting with reality, and is a holder of powers.

original: de nyid kyi phyir shel ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir shel ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: For that very reason, it is said like crystal, etc.

original: shel ltar dag pa zhes bya ba ni dang ba dang yid ches pa'i dad par ldan pa'o //
analyzed: shel ltar dag pa zhes bya ba ni dang ba dang yid ches pa'i dad par ldan pa'o //
translated: Like crystal means possessing clear and confident faith.

original: de'i chos zhes bya ba ni thar pa la sogs pa'i dngos grub kyi lam ste /
analyzed: de'i chos zhes bya ba ni thar pa la sogs pa'i dngos grub kyi lam ste /
translated: The dharma of that is the path of powers such as liberation,

original: lha'i rnal 'byor ro //🔽gzhan du na skyon bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: lha'i rnal 'byor ro // gzhan du na skyon bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: which is divine yoga.

original: gal te zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /🔽the tshom @241a * //
analyzed: gal te zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te / the tshom @241a * //
translated: Otherwise, to show the faults, it is said if, etc.

original: zhes bya ba ni bla mas bstan pa'i lam la yid gnyis za ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bla mas bstan pa'i lam la yid gnyis za ba'o //
translated: Doubt means uncertainty about the path taught by the guru.

original: de'i tshe cir 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: de'i tshe cir 'gyur zhe na /
translated: What happens then?

original: skad cig gis zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te go sla'o //
analyzed: skad cig gis zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te go sla'o //
translated: The phrase in an instant and so on is easy to understand.

original: 'dod pa 'ba' zhig don du gnyer ba la chos bstan pa dgag pa'i phyir /
analyzed: 'dod pa 'ba' zhig don du gnyer ba la chos bstan pa dgag pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to prohibit the teaching of the Dharma to those who seek only the pleasures of the desire realm, [the root text] states,

original: 'dod la dga' ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
analyzed: 'dod la dga' ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
translated: Those who delight in desire.

original: sngar pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg pa'i tshul lam rmongs shing 'gro ba'i don lhur len pa rnams la /
analyzed: sngar pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg pa'i tshul lam rmongs shing 'gro ba'i don lhur len pa rnams la /
translated: For those who are confused about the way of the perfection vehicle and who are dedicated to the welfare of beings,

original: sbyin par bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: sbyin par bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: the teaching of generosity is given.

original: sems can don bya'i phyir du ni //
analyzed: sems can don bya'i phyir du ni //
translated: For the sake of benefiting sentient beings,

original: rab tu 'bad pa de nyid dmigs //🔽zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: rab tu 'bad pa de nyid dmigs // zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: one should strive for that very object.

original: bstan par bya ba zhes bya ba lhag ma yin no //🔽de nyid ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: bstan par bya ba zhes bya ba lhag ma yin no // de nyid ces bya ba ni /
translated: The phrase that very object is the remainder of the teaching.

original: chos bdag med pa ste stong pa nyid kyi cha'o //
analyzed: chos bdag med pa ste stong pa nyid kyi cha'o //
translated: That very object is the emptiness of the selflessness of phenomena.

original: dmigs pa ni khong du chud pa'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa ni khong du chud pa'o //
translated: Object means comprehension.

original: rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi yul la spyod pa bskyad pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir gal te zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi yul la spyod pa bskyad pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir gal te zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: In order to teach the practice of the object of yogis, [the root text] states, If one has not attained the object of yoga.

original: gal te zhes bya ba ni ji ste rnal 'byor pa gzhan gyi don du gnyer ba chags pa can yin na'o //
analyzed: gal te zhes bya ba ni ji ste rnal 'byor pa gzhan gyi don du gnyer ba chags pa can yin na'o //
translated: If, means if the yogi is desirous of the benefit of others.

original: 'dod la dga' zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa la nye bar spyod par 'dod pa'o //
analyzed: 'dod la dga' zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa la nye bar spyod par 'dod pa'o //
translated: Delighting in desire means wishing to enjoy desire.

original: de'i tshe thabs kyi mtshan nyid gcig yod de zhes bya bar sbyar te /
analyzed: de'i tshe thabs kyi mtshan nyid gcig yod de zhes bya bar sbyar te /
translated: At that time, there is one characteristic of the means, means should be supplied.

original: thabs zhes bya ba ni lam mo //
analyzed: thabs zhes bya ba ni lam mo //
translated: The means is the path.

original: gcig ces bya ba ni dam pa ste zla med pa'o //
analyzed: gcig ces bya ba ni dam pa ste zla med pa'o //
translated: One means the best, the peerless.

original: ji ltar zhe na rang dga' zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: ji ltar zhe na rang dga' zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: How? He says, by one's own desire, etc.

original: rang dga' zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: rang dga' zhes bya ba ni /
translated: One's own desire means

original: bud med kyi yul lo //
analyzed: bud med kyi yul lo //
translated: the object of a woman.

original: skad cig ces bya ba ni gnas skabs so //
analyzed: skad cig ces bya ba ni gnas skabs so //
translated: The moment means the occasion.

original: gang gi zhe na /
analyzed: gang gi zhe na /
translated: Whose?

original: yang dag 'byung ba ste yul khyad par can rnyed pa'i tshe'o //
analyzed: yang dag 'byung ba ste yul khyad par can rnyed pa'i tshe'o //
translated: The arising of the real, when the special object is attained.

original: thabs dngos bstan pa'i phyir /🔽rdo rje dril bu zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: thabs dngos bstan pa'i phyir / rdo rje dril bu zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: In order to teach the actual means, he says,🔽the vajra and bell, etc.

original: rdo rje dril bu sbyor ba ni rdo rje padma sbyor ba'o //
analyzed: rdo rje dril bu sbyor ba ni rdo rje padma sbyor ba'o //
translated: The union of the vajra and bell is the union of the vajra and lotus.

original: de yang ji ltar sgrub cen skad cig tshul gyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: de yang ji ltar sgrub cen skad cig tshul gyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: By the method of the instant, etc.

original: skad cig gi tshul zhes bya ba ni yud tsam gyis rdzogs pa'o //
analyzed: skad cig gi tshul zhes bya ba ni yud tsam gyis rdzogs pa'o //
translated: The method of the instant is the completion in a moment.

original: de nyid kyi phyir /🔽bdag gi rnal 'byor bdag ces brjod//
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir / bdag gi rnal 'byor bdag ces brjod//
translated: Therefore,

original: ces bya ba smos te /
analyzed: ces bya ba smos te /
translated: one should utter the mantra of the yoga of the self.

original: bdag gi rnal 'byor ni rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin no //
analyzed: bdag gi rnal 'byor ni rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin no //
translated: The yoga of the self is the samadhi of Vajrasattva.

original: bdag ces brjod pa ni nga rgyal bskyed pa'o //
analyzed: bdag ces brjod pa ni nga rgyal bskyed pa'o //
translated: Utter the mantra means to generate pride.

original: gsang ba'i nang gi dbus gnas par //
analyzed: gsang ba'i nang gi dbus gnas par //
translated: In the middle of the secret place,

original: a'a li'i sa bon gzung bar bya //
analyzed: a'a li'i sa bon gzung bar bya //
translated: one should hold the seed of ali.

original: zhes bya ba ni khva ga mu kha'i rtsa'i sgor sa bon aa dgod pa dran par mdzad @241b pa yin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni khva ga mu kha'i rtsa'i sgor sa bon aa dgod pa dran par mdzad @241b pa yin no //
translated: This is a reminder to place the seed a at the door of the channel of the crow-faced one.

original: bdag nyid skad cig rnal 'byor ni //🔽h'um zhes bya ba 'bad de bzlas //
analyzed: bdag nyid skad cig rnal 'byor ni // h'um zhes bya ba 'bad de bzlas //
translated: The yoga of the instant of the self

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: is the recitation of the syllable hum.

original: skad cig ces bya ba ni rdo rje ste mi brtan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: skad cig ces bya ba ni rdo rje ste mi brtan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Instant means vajra, because it is not stable.

original: h'um zhes bya ba ni sa bon h'um ngo //
analyzed: h'um zhes bya ba ni sa bon h'um ngo //
translated: Hum means the seed syllable hum.

original: rnal 'byor zhes bya ba ni sbyar ba ste der bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor zhes bya ba ni sbyar ba ste der bsgom pa'o //
translated: Yoga means application, and that is meditation.

original: 'bad de bzlas zhes bya ba ni gnyis ka'i bzlas pa dran par mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: 'bad de bzlas zhes bya ba ni gnyis ka'i bzlas pa dran par mdzad pa'o //
translated: Recite with effort means to remember the recitation of both.

original: de ngag gis ni thabs dang shes rab kyi sbyor ba nye bar bsdu ba bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: de ngag gis ni thabs dang shes rab kyi sbyor ba nye bar bsdu ba bstan pa yin no //
translated: By that, he teaches the inclusion of the method and wisdom applications.🔽Whatever little there is of body and speech,

original: gang yang cung zad lus dang ngag / lha yi sbyor bar thim par bya //
analyzed: gang yang cung zad lus dang ngag / lha yi sbyor bar thim par bya //
translated: dissolve it into the deity yoga.

original: zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor pa'i phyir bya ba dgag pa yin te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor pa'i phyir bya ba dgag pa yin te /
translated: This is a prohibition of action for the yogi.

original: lus dang ngag ces bya ba ni lus dang ngag gi las te /
analyzed: lus dang ngag ces bya ba ni lus dang ngag gi las te /
translated: Body and speech means the actions of body and speech.

original: mdo gdon pa dang / mchod rten la phyag bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: mdo gdon pa dang / mchod rten la phyag bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: Reciting sutras, prostrating to stupas, and so forth.

original: cung zad ces bya ba ni ma lus par bsdu ba'o //
analyzed: cung zad ces bya ba ni ma lus par bsdu ba'o //
translated: Little means to include everything.

original: lha'i rnal 'byor zhes bya ba ni yid kyi las lha'i ting nge 'dzin to //
analyzed: lha'i rnal 'byor zhes bya ba ni yid kyi las lha'i ting nge 'dzin to //
translated: Deity yoga means the mental action of deity samadhi.

original: thim par bya zhes bya ba ni lha'i ting nge 'dzin yun ring du gus par bsgom pa la phyi'i bya ba dag dgag pa'o //
analyzed: thim par bya zhes bya ba ni lha'i ting nge 'dzin yun ring du gus par bsgom pa la phyi'i bya ba dag dgag pa'o //
translated: Dissolve it means to prohibit external actions in the long-term, devoted meditation on deity samadhi.

original: da ni de ltar chos bstan pa'i bdag nyid che ba gsal bar bya ba'i phyir //
analyzed: da ni de ltar chos bstan pa'i bdag nyid che ba gsal bar bya ba'i phyir //
translated: Now, in order to clarify the greatness of the nature of the teaching of the Dharma in that way, [the Bhagavān] declares,

original: thal sbyar zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: thal sbyar zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: “With palms joined” and so forth.

original: rnal 'byor rnal 'byor ma dbang phyug / ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: rnal 'byor rnal 'byor ma dbang phyug / ces bya ba ni /
translated: “The lords of yogins and yoginīs”

original: phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i dbang phyug rnams dang / rnal 'byor ma rnams te /
analyzed: phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i dbang phyug rnams dang / rnal 'byor ma rnams te /
translated: are the lords of yogins such as Vajrapāṇi and the yoginīs,

original: mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyis de ltar bka' stsal ba'i chos gsan cing thos nas /
analyzed: mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyis de ltar bka' stsal ba'i chos gsan cing thos nas /
translated: the ḍākinīs, who listen to the Dharma that the Bhagavān has thus taught and having heard it,

original: thal mo sbyar te bstod do zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: thal mo sbyar te bstod do zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: join their palms and praise him.

original: ci lta bus bstod ce na /
analyzed: ci lta bus bstod ce na /
translated: In what way do they praise him?

original: dgyes shing thugs ni tshim pa yi //
analyzed: dgyes shing thugs ni tshim pa yi //
translated: He declares, “Delighted, satisfied in mind,”

original: zhes bya ba smos te ;
analyzed: zhes bya ba smos te ;
translated: and so forth.

original: bcom ldan 'das thugs dgyes shing tshim par byed pa'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das thugs dgyes shing tshim par byed pa'o //
translated: The Bhagavān is delighted and satisfied.

original: gang zhe na /
analyzed: gang zhe na /
translated: What is that?

original: ae ma'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: ae ma'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: “Amazing!” and so forth.

original: 'gro ba thar pa di ring thob //
analyzed: 'gro ba thar pa di ring thob //
translated: Today beings have attained liberation.

original: ces bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung rdo rje dril bu la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi thabs de dag gis /
analyzed: ces bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung rdo rje dril bu la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi thabs de dag gis /
translated: By those means of meditative concentration such as the bell, etc.

original: de ring ste tshe 'di nyid la 'gro ba rnams kyis thar pa thob pa ngo mtshar che ba'o //
analyzed: de ring ste tshe 'di nyid la 'gro ba rnams kyis thar pa thob pa ngo mtshar che ba'o //
translated: , today, in this very life, the attainment of liberation by beings is marvelous.

original: 'gro ba rnams zhes bya ba ni rigs la sogs pa'i nges pa med par gzung ba'o //
analyzed: 'gro ba rnams zhes bya ba ni rigs la sogs pa'i nges pa med par gzung ba'o //
translated: Beings is taken without any restriction as to family, etc.

original: ae ma'o chos kyi mchog gi lam //
analyzed: ae ma'o chos kyi mchog gi lam //
translated: Ah! The path of the supreme Dharma!

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: Here,

original: chos zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: chos zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid do //
translated: Dharma is emptiness by intrinsic nature.

original: mchog ces bya ba ni @242a * //
analyzed: mchog ces bya ba ni @242a * //
translated: Supreme is

original: dam pa ste lha'i sku'o //
analyzed: dam pa ste lha'i sku'o //
translated: the highest, the divine body.🔽Ah is

original: ae ma zhes bya ba ni ngo mtshar ba'o //
analyzed: ae ma zhes bya ba ni ngo mtshar ba'o //
translated: marvelous.

original: ae ma 'khor pa po //
analyzed: ae ma 'khor pa po //
translated: Ah! The one who turns the wheel!

original: zhes bya ba ni 'khor ba las grol ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni 'khor ba las grol ba'o //
translated: This is liberation from the wheel.

original: ae ma rnal 'byor grol ba'i gnas //
analyzed: ae ma rnal 'byor grol ba'i gnas //
translated: Ah! The abode of the liberated yogin!

original: zhes bya ba ni thar pa'i lam du sbyar ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni thar pa'i lam du sbyar ba'o //
translated: This is the application to the path of liberation.

original: ae ma ngo mtshar rnal 'byor lam//
analyzed: ae ma ngo mtshar rnal 'byor lam//
translated: Ah! The path of the marvelous yogin!

original: zhes bya ba ni bde ba chen po'i grong khyer du 'gro ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bde ba chen po'i grong khyer du 'gro ba'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because one goes to the city of great bliss.

original: lam des tshegs med par grub pa bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: lam des tshegs med par grub pa bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to demonstrate that one attains power without difficulty by means of this path,

original: tshes grangs med cing zhes bya ba smos te go sla'o //
analyzed: tshes grangs med cing zhes bya ba smos te go sla'o //
translated: he says, “without regard to lunar day,” which is easy to understand.

original: yang las kyi cho ga bstan pa'i phyir las kyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: yang las kyi cho ga bstan pa'i phyir las kyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: Again, in order to demonstrate the rite of action, he says, “the wheel of action,” and so on.

original: las kyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba ni las kyi tshogs te /

analyzed: ji ltar blta zhes bya ba ni ji ltar dmigs pa'o //
